reviews.review: Most of the musical scores were weak and took up time that would have been best spent enhancing the story line. The best part of the film was the last 20 minutes.
Going back to watch it again Tuesday already bought tickets taking family!
Just as good as the first one if not better!

Like visiting with old friends...very fun! Music was not as AMAZING, not as catchy. This surprises me, as I feel that the first movie balanced the characters, music, and the story really well. This was a revisit with great characters, a good shot at character development of the lost parents who birthed these amazing kids, but the story was not elevated and driven by the music this time, still fun though!
It was very dramatic and predictable

The animation was stunning!!!!!!
The music was great-just not as catchy or memorable as the first. 
I loved all of Anna and Elsas outfits.
Some of the plot lines felt rushed and left me with a few unanswered questions.
Totally worth fighting the crowds to go see it in theaters!
I liked it Better than the original

My daughter and I loved the fact that this movie showed both of the sisters strengths and allowed them to be who they really are. In the first Frozen movie you could tell Elsa was struggling to fit in Arendelle, and Anna was the level head mostly. But Frozen II allowed them to show that they were born to parents of separate nations and 1 of them needed to be with the other side. This was a great way to show how different but yet a like in theor hearts they were. Great job with this one. And the new songs were perfect! We downloaded the soundtrack prior to going to see the movie.

It was a lot  better than the first one. Kids young and old enjoyed it!  We had seven in our group from 9 to 62 yrs old.  Gave it 4 stars because it starts really slow and you could see the really young ones loose interest

Was it really difficult to write a good story for Frozen 2? We honestly dont remember one song.  It was a bit confusing and so predictable all in one. I would say disappointing after such an unforgettable first movie.
